name: Neko Navy: Daydream Edition
summary: Flying cats versus 10,000 soothing characters! What awaits them beyond all those furious midair fights...? Witness the world's most shocking ending for yourself! Shoot, evade, and detonate Bombers! "Neko Navy" is an exhilarating horizontal scrolling shooter where you can shoot them up with easy controls. The game offers three difficulties that everyone from a beginner to an advanced player can enjoy. Fire off as many Bombers as you can to achieve high scores! Daydream Edition features rebalanced difficulties - harder DEATH mode - and infinite fun with an all-new ∞ Mode!
